word_mean: 虫胶，片胶：印度产的一种虫胶，系一种昆虫(紫胶虫)在植物上的分泌物)形成
有时用于牙科、外科及糖膏剂和糖衣片

PerfectNetExp.abs: 虫胶（Shellac）通常用于木材加工产品，如家具、吉他，甚至是AK-47。虫胶来自紫胶虫的排泄物，最常见的来自泰国的森林，紫胶 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from shell + lac, translating French laque en écailles 'lac in thin plates'

entry.def: Shellac is a kind of natural varnish which you paint on to wood to give it a shiny surface.

means.word_mean: 1. lac purified by heating and filtering; usually in thin orange or yellow flakes but sometimes bleached white
2. a thin varnish made by dissolving lac in ethanol; used to finish wood

sentences.sentence: "She wanted to shellac the desk to protect it from water spots"
